::KitKat::
She looked down at the head. She smiled and chuckled. "Yeah, call me 
names, but your dead."  She looked around at her allies. "HE"S DEAD! 
MEGATRON IS DEAD!"

Then a thought crossed her mind. Megatron was way to easy to kill. 
Something was wrong, but she couldn't put her finger on it. She 
muttered to herself,"that was too easy.  He should have been more of 
a challenge to destroy like that."

She looked around for Drillbit, "Check your scanners.  See if there 
are are any more of Megatron's friends about."


DarkMouse::
She looked at Inferno. "By the Matrix! What are you doing here? You 
look upset. What's wrong?"





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Inferno fell to the ground with his face scourged by the fumes 
of Star 
> Scream. He got up and looked over, the last of the clones fell to 
thr ground. 
> He was all that was left. Taking out his gun he made a tactical 
withdrawl 
> until he saw Megatron, the clone.
>     "Royalty! You have come for me! Together we shall destroy these 
> invaders!" He cried with enthusiasm. He began to run towrds 
Megatron, but 
> stopped as a grenade landed right between his feet. "Royalty! Look 
out!"
>     The clone looked down at the grenade, cried out, and blew to 
scrap before 
> the ees of Inferno. His head landed on the ground and rolled over 
to 
> Kitkat...."You......little.....bitch....."It said with its last 
ounce of 
> energy, and then died. The head blanked out, a rather perfect 
trophy.
>     "No! The Queen! .....You shall pay for this!" Inferno cried, 
took to the 
> sky, and went as fast as he could fly. He saw a small being beneath 
him in 
> the forest and went down. Apon landing he saw it was Darkmouse...a 
fimiliar 
> face.
> 
>     "Excellent. Everything is going to plan. When Inferno arrives, 
and 
> Terrorsaur, we can begin phase two. Hahahahahahah!" He bellowed 
sitting on 
> his Command Chair.
>     "Your a freak!" Adrax cried, who now resided within a steal 
cage 
> suspended above a pit that was rather deep. He dangled back and 
forth.
>     Megatron turned, "Silence! Your only alive because you know the 
access 
> codes. Now shut up!"
